flawed_nl_solution:
Michael gives away 42/2=<<42/2=12>>12 dollars.
His brother then has 12+17=<<12+17=29>>29 dollars.
In the end, his brother has 29-3=<<29-3=26>>26 dollars.
#### 26

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 12. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
